entry.title: Mother Pink Roses Hankie Greeting Gift Card - Only 5 Left!
entry.summary:
Vendor: Luray Hankies
Type: Hanky Cards
Price: 12.99

Our lovely Mother Pink Roses Hankie Greeting Gift Card includes a full size usable hankie easily removed from a matching greeting card.  The card reads For You and the hanky reads Mother.  The card has a place on the back to write To and From along with space for a special note.  This item also include an envelope for mailing enclosed in clear cellophane.  This is a greeting card and gift all in one with her receiving a thoughtful greeting from you along with a gift she can keep always. 

Hankie measures 13' square ~ 100% Cotton Batiste Comes with white mailing envelope and cello sleeved.

entry.title: Welcome Baby Hankie Bonnet Gift Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Once Upon a Hankie
Type: Vintage Style Hankies
Price: 23.99

Welcome Baby Hankie Bonnet Gift Card is an adorable way to welcome baby with both a greeting and keepsake gift.  Card is printed and hankie hand sewn in the USA. Bonnet has made from a beautiful hankie with lovely ribbons and cutely fashion into a gift to be treasured for many years to come.

Inside card text reads: 

A Tiny Square of Linen and a Dainty

Edge of Lace, Designed into a Bonnet

To Frame Your Baby’s Face.

 

After Baby’s Worn it, Fold and Tuck

Away… and it Becomes a Hankie for Your

Daughter’s Wedding Day,

Or if the Baby is a Boy, on the Day

He Marries this can be the “Something Old” for His Joyful Bride to Be.

entry.title: Hankie Christening Bonnet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Alice's Cottage
Type: Baby Bonnets
Price: 19.99

Made from a beautifully embroidered handkerchief, this is the perfect gift for your favorite newborn. Gift box, with poem shown.

Poem Text
I am a little bonnet
As you can plainly see.
But could you guess a handkerchief
Is what I use to be?

Wear me home from the hospital
And again on Christening Day.
Then safely keep me tucked away
Until your Wedding Day.

For good fortune all brides
Must wear something old
So just clip a couple of stitches
And a wedding hanky will unfold.

If perhaps it is a boy
On the day he is to wed
Won't his bride be proud to use
The bonnet worn upon his head.

entry.title: Welcome Thanksgiving Hankie Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Once Upon a Hankie
Type: Hanky Cards
Price: 12.99

The Give Thanks Hankie Card features a beautiful Victorian lady ready to serve Thanksgiving Dinner in her lovely hanky dress.  "Thanksgiving - The year has turned its circle, the seasons come and go, the harvest is all gathered in, orchards have shared their treasures, fields their yellow grain.  So open wide the doorway, Thanksgiving comes again."
